channel.title: Hosting for free
channel.description: Willing to host your server online 24/7 ! first come first serve ! Must be a stable source, I can also code. Hit me up!

item.title: Hosting for free
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

[quote=“Uncalled, post:7, topic:520038”][quote author=Fridder link=topic=638533.msg4310422#msg4310422 date=1370651097]
This section is for development teams.
[/quote]Yes, though I clearly remembered that this wasn’t allowed. I remembered that moderators would give a warning to update their thread with content and what-not within 24 hours or else it would be locked. But if this is no longer in action, then that is news to me.[/quote]
Not quite that but not far off.

This section is for development teams only as stated above, if you feel like you have something to offer (e.g programming and hosting) apply for a server already posted in this board or start your own. Good luck!

Sorry for the 4 day late reply, just getting round to the bottom end of the report pile.

Read full topic

item.title: Hosting for free

item.description:
@Uncalled wrote:

[quote=“Fridder, post:6, topic:520038”]This section is for development teams.[/quote]Yes, though I clearly remembered that this wasn’t allowed. I remembered that moderators would give a warning to update their thread with content and what-not within 24 hours or else it would be locked. But if this is no longer in action, then that is news to me.
